we.0: Move, Inc. and its affiliates (“Company,” “we,” “us”) understand and respect that you care about your personal data and how it is used. We respect your privacy, as further described in our full Privacy Notice. These highlights set out some points about how we treat your personal data. Please review the full Privacy Notice to understand our privacy practices.

we.1: Move owns, operates, or provides access to a family of websites, and mobile apps, mobile-optimized websites and other applications and/or electronic media (such as, emails Move sends) (collectively, the “Services”). The Move Privacy Notice applies to those Services and describes how we treat your personal data when you use the Services. The Move Privacy Notice describes in detail what information we collect about you, why we collect it, what we do with it and how to contact us about our privacy practices.

we.2: We collect personal information/data from a variety of sources, including:

we.3: Our use of the personal information we collect will depend on the way you interact with the Services. For example, we may use the information we collect to:

we.4: Understand your interests and tell you about products and Services we think you will value;

we.5: And as we may otherwise notify you at the point of collection or with your consent.

we.6: As described further in our Privacy Notice, you have certain choices and rights related to the information we collect about you, including:

we.7: We may share your information in certain situations, including:

we.8: Where we have obtained your consent, including video content and social networking services as described in our Video Services Notice and Social Networking Services Notice;

we.9: We maintain administrative, technical and physical safeguards to protect and secure your information, but no data transmission or storage, or use of the Internet, can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.

information.0: Move owns, operates, or provides access to a family of websites, and mobile apps, mobile-optimized websites and other applications and/or electronic media (such as, emails Move sends) (collectively, the “Services”). The Move Privacy Notice applies to those Services and describes how we treat your personal data when you use the Services. The Move Privacy Notice describes in detail what information we collect about you, why we collect it, what we do with it and how to contact us about our privacy practices.

information.1: We collect personal information/data from a variety of sources, including:

information.2: Information you provide directly to the Services;

information.3: Information about you that our Company affiliates may also have;

information.4: Information about you from third-party sources, including public and commercially available sources; business partners; third-party social media networks, such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter;

information.5: Information about your device and browsing activities on the Services, including through cookies and other similar technologies.

information.6: Our use of the personal information we collect will depend on the way you interact with the Services. For example, we may use the information we collect to:

information.7: As described further in our Privacy Notice, you have certain choices and rights related to the information we collect about you, including:

information.8: You will have the opportunity to access, update and correct contact information that you choose to share with us, subject to applicable law.

information.9: We may share your information in certain situations, including:

information.10: We maintain administrative, technical and physical safeguards to protect and secure your information, but no data transmission or storage, or use of the Internet, can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.

information.11: For more information about our privacy practices, please review the full Privacy Notice.

information.12: If you have questions, comments or concerns regarding our privacy practices or the Privacy Notice, or wish to update your information, please contact us at Privacy@move.com. You may also write to us using the postal address listed below:

information.13: The Californian Shine the Light Law, the California Consumer Privacy Protection Act (CCPA) and the California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA) provide certain rights to residents of California. For additional information for California residents, please review our California Privacy Rights.

information.14: The data privacy and/or protection acts of the following states: Colorado, Connecticut, Delaware, Indiana, Iowa, Montana, Oregon, Tennessee, Texas, Utah and Virginia each provide certain rights to their respective residents. For additional information for those residents, please review our Other US State Privacy Rights.

information.15: The Canadian Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act (PIPEDA) provides certain rights to residents of Canada. For additional information for Canadian residents, please review our Canadian Privacy Rights.
